body: Hi  I added the HB_setEPZone Thresholds component into the canvas. But I am still confused about the same result I got regarding using different cooling set points. See as below: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5UirxQfJfB0l6W7upGvAHDswYScLIfo2IMXM6JNsVTsZmZEcaRbdx2xmJMibiNB4E6EFlXDKAB4qb2Z2qAFP6AuornG5*pbY/Results.jpg) I have also attached the modified example file which I add 'HB_setEPZoneThresholds' component into 'Apply Properties for an Energy Simulation' part. Can anyone kindly give me a brief explain? Very appreciate in advance!
